name: Two is better than One
description:
Welcome to Two is better than one! Just like the Title says, it can be played with just one person but, it feels better with Two people. So, grab someone close to you and finish each level before time runs out in this co-op platformer inspired by Fall Guys, It Takes Two and Super Mario Bros.

Special thanks to the following for providing sounds on FreeSound.org:

"Falling, Comedic, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Splash, Jumping, H.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Woohoo Mouse Squirrel Cartoon by dersuperanton freesound.org"
